=Networked Ratings (nrate)=
nsdci/dcicommon/nrate.c

==Introduction==
The Networked Ratings API (nrate) keeps track of counts and totals to determine the average to a given precision.  The api is only exposed when properly configured. See the "Configuration" section for more information.
